attributes.action: Brexiteers in parliament are to hold their ground. Defeat May's atrocious deal.
attributes.additional_details: The Peoples of the UK demand the return of our freedom, our democracy and our sovereignty.
attributes.background: May's deal delivers nothing even near fulfilling the referendum promises. For this reason Brexiteers in parliament are instructed to stand their ground and see that the May/Merkel deal is yet again defeated.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
